com.nestlabs.sdk

Class Thermostat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nestlabs.sdk.Device
      • com.nestlabs.sdk.Thermostat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parcelable

    public class Thermostat
extends Device
implements Parcelable
    Thermostat represents and contains all properties of a Nest Thermostat.

    • Nested Class Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int describeContents() 
      boolean equals(Object obj) 
      double getAmbientTemperatureC()
      Returns the current ambient temperature in the structure in Celsius.
      long getAmbientTemperatureF()
      Returns the current ambient temperature in the structure in Fahrenheit.
      double getAwayTemperatureHighC()
      Returns the temperature (in Celsius) at which the cooling system will engage when in "Away" state.
      long getAwayTemperatureHighF()
      Returns the temperature (in Fahrenheit) at which the cooling system will engage when in "Away" state.
      double getAwayTemperatureLowC()
      Returns the temperature (in Celsius) at which the heating system will engage when in "Away" state.
      long getAwayTemperatureLowF()
      Returns the temperature (in Fahrenheit) at which the heating system will engage when in "Away" state.
      boolean getCanCool()
      Returns true if this thermostat is connected to a cooling system.
      boolean getCanHeat()
      Returns true if this thermostat is connected to a heating system.
      boolean getFanTimerActive()
      Returns true if the fan is currently running on a timer, false otherwise.
      String getFanTimerTimeout()
      If the fan is running on a timer, this provides the timestamp (in ISO-8601 format) at which the fan will stop running.
      boolean getHasFan()
      Returns true if this thermostat has a connected fan.
      boolean getHasLeaf()
      Returns true if the thermostat is currently displaying the leaf indicator, false otherwise.
      long getHumidity()
      Returns the humidity, in percent (%) format, measured at the device.
      String getHvacMode()
      Returns the current operating mode of the thermostat.
      String getHvacState()
      Returns whether HVAC system is actively heating, cooling or is off.
      double getTargetTemperatureC()
      Returns the target temperature of the thermostat in Celsius.
      long getTargetTemperatureF()
      Returns the target temperature of the thermostat in Fahrenheit.
      double getTargetTemperatureHighC()
      Returns the target temperature of the cooling system in Celsius when in "Heat and Cool" mode.
      long getTargetTemperatureHighF()
      Returns the target temperature of the cooling system in Fahrenheit when in "Heat and Cool" mode.
      double getTargetTemperatureLowC()
      Returns the target temperature of the heating system in Fahrenheit when in "Heat and Cool" mode.
      long getTargetTemperatureLowF()
      Returns the target temperature of the heating system in Celsius when in "Heat and Cool" mode.
      String getTemperatureScale()
      Returns the temperature scale: one of "C" (Celsius) or "F" (Fahrenheit) that this thermostat should display temperatures in.
      boolean isUsingEmergencyHeat()
      Returns true if this thermostat is currently operating using the emergency heating system.

      • getHvacState

        public String getHvacState()
        Returns whether HVAC system is actively heating, cooling or is off.

        Values: "heating", "cooling", "off"

        Returns:
        whether HVAC system is actively heating, cooling or is off.

        public String getFanTimerTimeout()
        If the fan is running on a timer, this provides the timestamp (in ISO-8601 format) at which the fan will stop running.
        Returns:

        public String getTemperatureScale()
        Returns the temperature scale: one of "C" (Celsius) or "F" (Fahrenheit) that this thermostat should display temperatures in.
        Returns:

      • getTargetTemperatureF

        public long getTargetTemperatureF()
        Returns the target temperature of the thermostat in Fahrenheit. Note that this is only applicable when in Heat or Cool mode, not "Heat and Cool" mode.
        Returns:
        the target temperature of the thermostat in Fahrenheit.

      • getTargetTemperatureC

        public double getTargetTemperatureC()
        Returns the target temperature of the thermostat in Celsius. Note that this is only applicable when in Heat or Cool mode, not "Heat and Cool" mode.
        Returns:
        the target temperature of the thermostat in Celsius.
